messages.TRMSG_PRE_BATTLE:
One thing about Water-type Pokémon:
There’s a huge variety!I’ll show you the Water-type Pokémon I
chose and why I’m so proud of them!
messages.TRMSG_DEFEAT:
I can’t boast when I lose...
I’m so disappointed...
messages.TRMSG_POST_BATTLE:
Sure I lost, but watch me! I’ll get
tougher with water Pokémon.
messages.TRMSG_REMATCH:
This time, my water Pokémon will show
you why I’m so proud of them!
